Package com.intellij.util.indexing

Class ScalarIndexExtension<K>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intellij.util.indexing.IndexExtension<K,V,FileContent>
      • com.intellij.util.indexing.FileBasedIndexExtension<K,java.lang.Void>
        • com.intellij.util.indexing.ScalarIndexExtension<K>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AntImportsIndex, BytecodeAnalysisIndex, DomFileIndex, FilenameIndexImpl, FileTypeIndexImpl, FormClassIndex, FrameworkDetectionIndex, Html5CustomAttributesIndex, JavaAutoModuleNameIndex, JavaFxControllerClassIndex, JavaNullMethodArgumentIndex, JavaSourceModuleNameIndex, PyModuleNameIndex, PySetuptoolsNamespaceIndex, RelaxSymbolIndex, TrigramIndex

    public abstract class ScalarIndexExtension<K>
extends FileBasedIndexExtension<K,java.lang.Void>
    A specialization of FileBasedIndexExtension allowing to create a mapping [DataObject -> List of files containing this object].
